text: Pseudodrephalys hypargus is a butterfly belonging to the family Hesperiidae. These butterflies are commonly found in Venezuela (Amazonas), Guyana, French Guiana, Brazil (Amazonas, Pará, Mato Grosso, Rondônia), Peru (Madre de Dios). ==References== http://www.ftp.funet.fi/index/Tree_of_life/insecta/lepidoptera/ditrysia/hesperioidea/hesperiidae/pyrginae/pseudodrephalys/index.html#atinas Category:Pyrgini Category:Taxa named by Paul Mabille fr:Pyrginae
title: Pseudodrephalys hypargus
